root.swedish: S: vad kan jag hjälpa dig med U: jag vill köpa en hund S: hur viktigt är det för dig på en skala mellan noll och fem att hunden kan tränas U: fem S: på en skala mellan noll och fem hur viktigt är det för dig eller hur mycket skall hunden fälla U: två S: på en skala mellan noll och fem hur mycket energi skall hunden ha U: fem S: då föreslår jag att du skaffar dig en barbado de terceira U: gärna
root.english: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: how important is it to you on a scale between zero and five that the dog can be trained U: five A: on a scale between zero and five how important is it to you or how much should the dog shed U: two A: on a scale between zero and five, how much energy should the dog have U: five A: then I suggest you get a barbado de terceira U: yes please
root.distillation: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: how important is it to you on a scale between zero and five that the dog can be trained U: five A: on a scale between zero and five how important is it to you or how much should the dog shed U: two A: on a scale between zero and five, how much energy should the dog have U: five A: then I suggest you get a barbado de terceira U: yes please
root.final: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: how important is it to you on a scale between zero and five that the dog can be trained U: five A: on a scale between zero and five how important is it to you or how much should the dog shed U: two A: on a scale between zero and five, how much energy should the dog have U: five A: then I suggest you get a barbado de terceira U: yes please
